info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 2:48PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern San Miguel County through 315 PM MDT... At 247 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sawpit, or 32 miles south of Montrose, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern San Miguel County, including the following locations... Fall Creek and Placerville. This includes the following highways... Colorado 62 between mile markers 1 and 13. Colorado 145 between mile markers 77 and 86. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
